imdb.plot outline: Sharps, Harve Jessy and Bob must escape native stikbots, climb the Hymalayas and fight off mummies to find the treasure buried in "The Ancient Tomb of Stikbot". At the same time a crew of evil stikbots wants the same treasure, and continually get in the way. The rewards are big, but at what cost are they willing to find it.
imdb.title: The Ancient Tomb of Stikbot
akas: The Ancient Tomb of Stikbot (United States)
plot: Sharps, Harve Jessy and Bob must escape native stikbots, climb the Hymalayas and fight off mummies to find the treasure buried in "_The Ancient Tomb of Stikbot_ (qv)". At the same time a crew of evil stikbots wants the same treasure, and continually get in the way. The rewards are big, but at what cost are they willing to find it.::Nikolai Pike
